full_sentence: If you live in a zoo and you're likely to encounter a troop of monkeys outside, carry a big can of bear mace with you. There is no shame in doing this. Sure, the system will still come after YOU for something, but iit's better than going to jail for "murder" if you are forced to shoot one of them while the rest call the police on you on their new iphones
